desc: Firefly Nature School is a place to get great homeschool materials for kids to discover the great outdoors. Lesson plans made simple for the at-home mom or dad looking to inspire their children's love of the outdoors. Individual lessons and bundled lessons are available for download in the store.

layout.text: Downloadable lessons designed to inspire children's love for nature.
CHECK OUT OUR WILD MAG! NATURE STUDY SUBSCRIPTION
